definition: apparently right but actually wrong; specious (idiom)
to seem/to appear/to resemble/similar/-like/pseudo-/(more) than
old variant of 似[si4]
see 似的[shi4 de5]
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: A concise, clever, often paradoxical statement.
sentences.chinese: 隽语一个简明，机智，经常似是而非的陈述。
这是一个似是而非的伪问题。

sentences.english: Being right half the time beats being half-right all the time.
sentences.chinese: 不怕半生皆是谬误，只怕一生似是而非。

sentences.english: Half-truth and hearsay was called truth.
sentences.chinese: 似是而非及异端邪说被视为真理。

sentences.english: NEPA requires that plausible statements as to the prospective impacts be disclosed in advance.
sentences.chinese: 覃要求的陌瞻性声明为似是而非的关系是提前披露。

sentences.english: Both automation and manual testing are plausible.
sentences.chinese: 自动化和手工测试都是似是而非的。

sentences.english: In fact, a careful analysis of these two points will know all specious.
sentences.chinese: 其实，仔细分析就知道这两点都似是而非。

sentences.english: Such talk is actually specious and groundless.
sentences.chinese: 这些话实际上毫无根据，似是而非的。

sentences.english: Half bright & half dark, Seems right maybe not.
When it comes to human affairs, everything is paradoxical.
sentences.chinese: 说到人世间的事，一切都是似是而非的。

sentences.english: Rammer in English Study----Make clear things that are ambiguous; Consolidate knowledge that is not solid.
sentences.chinese: 把似是而非彻底搞懂，把不扎实知识彻底巩固。

sentences.english: This is a very plausible situation.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很似是而非的情景。
一切事情都变得似是而非了。

sentences.english: The author believed that these criticize speciously, with historical actually not symbol.
sentences.chinese: 笔者认为，这些指摘都似是而非，与历史实际不符。

sentences.english: Results that look too good to be true often are.
sentences.chinese: 结果看上去美好误以为真，往往似是而非。

sentences.english: I’m sure that waffling answer won’t satisfy the masses.
sentences.chinese: 我确信似是而非的回答将不会满足大众。

definition: equivocal/ambiguous
deliberately mystifying/to make sth unnecessarily complicated
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
to not know what sb is driving at/to be unintelligible
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
mystery within a mystery/the mysteries of the Dao according to Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
to contradict oneself/self-contradictory/inconsistent
hard to tell if it's real or sham
vague and general/not specific/shallow/empty
absurd/preposterous/ridiculous
ridiculous/unbelievable/absurd
amidst the clouds and mist/(fig.) mystified/puzzled
specious arguments/sophistry
empty cave, nothing there (idiom); devoid of substance/nothing new to show
